email_chain.subject: Vessel Offer for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the vessel MV OCEAN HORIZON available for your coal shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam. The vessel has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290m. The freight rate is $22/MT on CIF terms. Laycan is 15-20 October. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Offer for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Can you do $20/MT? Also, can you confirm the loading window and demurrage rate?

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Offer for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I can offer $21/MT, which is competitive given the current market. The loading window is 72 hours, and the demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Vessel Offer for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

$21/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan and send over the charter party for review.

Best,
John

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Please find attached the charter party for your review. The laycan is confirmed as 15-20 October. Let me know if any adjustments are needed.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

The charter party looks good. We will proceed as discussed. Thanks for your assistance!

Best,
John
